name: politico
text:
Trump acknowledged today that his prospective executive order mandating coverage for pre-existing conditions amounted to political messaging – and that Obamacare already offers those protections
https://t.co/87KtROHS7v

name: politico
text:
Trump and Republicans are vulnerable on the issue of pre-existing conditions after waging a lengthy legal battle to strike down Obamacare and its consumer protections without offering a replacement
https://t.co/87KtROHS7v

name: politico
text:
Liberty University announced that Jerry Prevo will serve as acting president while Jerry Falwell Jr., one of Trump’s leading evangelical supporters, takes “an indefinite leave of absence” following criticism for posting a photo with his pants unzipped
https://t.co/i7yqXRCviI
